스킬 II

SKILLS II

치료 (Wis)

HEAL (WIS)

Check: The DC and effect depend on the task you attempt.

Task 치료 DC
First 보조15
Long-term care 15
Treat wound from caltrop, 가시 성장, or 가시 암석 15
Treat 독 독’s save DC
Treat 질병 질병’s save DC

First 보조: You usually use first 보조 to save a 죽어가고 있음 character. If a character has negative 히트 포인트 and is losing 히트 포인트 (at the rate of 1 per round, 1 per hour, or 1 per day), you can make him or her stable. A stable character regains no 히트 포인트 but stops losing them.

Long-Term Care: Providing long-term care means treating a wounded person for a day or more. If your 치료 check is successful, the patient recovers 히트 포인트 or ability score points (lost to ability 피해) at twice the normal rate: 2 히트 포인트 per 레벨 for a full 8 hours of rest in a day, or 4 히트 포인트 per 레벨 for each full day of complete rest; 2 ability score points for a full 8 hours of rest in a day, or 4 ability score points for each full day of complete rest.

You can tend as many as six patients at a time. You need a few items and supplies (bandages, salves, and so on) that are easy to come by in settled lands. Giving long-term care counts as 빛 activity for the healer. You cannot give long-term care to yourself.

Treat Wound from Caltrop, 가시 성장, or 가시 암석: A creature wounded by stepping on a caltrop 이동 at one-half normal 속도. A successful 치료 check removes this 이동 penalty.

A creature wounded by a 가시 성장 or 가시 암석 spell must succeed on a Reflex save or take injuries that reduce his 속도 by one-third. Another character can remove this penalty by taking 10 minutes to dress the victim’s injuries and succeeding on a 치료 check against the spell’s save DC.

Treat 독: To treat 독 means to tend a single character who has been poisoned and who is going to take more 피해 from the 독 (or suffer some other effect). Every time the poisoned character makes a 내성 굴림 against the 독, you make a 치료 check. The poisoned character uses your check result or his or her 내성 굴림, whichever is higher.

Treat 질병: To treat a 질병 means to tend a single diseased character. Every time he or she makes a 내성 굴림 against 질병 effects, you make a 치료 check. The diseased character uses your check result or his or her 내성 굴림, whichever is higher.

Action: Providing first 보조, treating a wound, or treating 독 is a standard action. Treating a 질병 or tending a creature wounded by a 가시 성장 or 가시 암석 spell takes 10 minutes of work. Providing long-term care requires 8 hours of 빛 activity.

Try Again: Varies. Generally speaking, you can’t try a 치료 check again without proof of the original check’s failure. You can always retry a check to provide first 보조, assuming the target of the previous attempt is still alive.

Special: A character with the 자급자족 feat gets a +2 bonus on 치료 checks.

A healer’s kit gives you a +2 circumstance bonus on 치료 checks.

숨기 (Dex; 갑옷 판정 패널티)

HIDE (DEX; ARMOR CHECK PENALTY)

Check: Your 숨기 check is opposed by the 감지 check of anyone who might see you. You can 이동 up to one-half your normal 속도 and 숨기 at no penalty. When moving at a 속도 상급 than one-half but less than your normal 속도, you take a –5 penalty. It’s practically impossible (–20 penalty) to 숨기 while attacking, running or charging.

A creature larger or smaller than Medium takes a size bonus or penalty on 숨기 checks depending on its size category: Fine +16, Diminutive +12, Tiny +8, Small +4, Large –4, Huge –8, Gargantuan –12, Colossal –16.

You need 엄폐 or 은폐 in order to attempt a 숨기 check. Total 엄폐 or total 은폐 usually (but not always; see Special, below) obviates the need for a 숨기 check, since nothing can see you anyway.

If people are observing you, even casually, you can’t 숨기. You can 달리기 around a corner or behind 엄폐 so that you’re out of sight and then 숨기, but the others then know at least where you went.

If your observers are momentarily distracted (such as by a 허세 check; see below), though, you can attempt to 숨기. While the others turn their attention from you, you can attempt a 숨기 check if you can get to a hiding place of some kind. (As a general guideline, the hiding place has to be within 1 foot per rank you have in 숨기.) This check, however, is made at a –10 penalty because you have to 이동 fast.

Sniping: If you’ve already successfully hidden at least 10 feet from your target, you can make one ranged 공격, then immediately 숨기 again. You take a –20 penalty on your 숨기 check to conceal yourself after the shot.

Creating a Diversion to 숨기: You can use 허세 to help you 숨기. A successful 허세 check can give you the momentary diversion you need to attempt a 숨기 check while people are aware of you.

Action: Usually none. Normally, you make a 숨기 check as part of 이동, so it doesn’t take a separate action. However, hiding immediately after a ranged 공격 (see Sniping, above) is a 이동 action.

Special: If you are invisible, you gain a +40 bonus on 숨기 checks if you are immobile, or a +20 bonus on 숨기 checks if you’re moving.

If you have the 은신 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 숨기 checks.

A 13th-레벨 레인저 can attempt a 숨기 check in any sort of natural terrain, even if it doesn’t grant 엄폐 or 은폐. A 17thlevel 레인저 can do this even while being observed.

위협 (Cha)

INTIMIDATE (CHA)

Check: You can change another’s behavior with a successful check. Your 위협 check is opposed by the target’s modified 레벨 check (1d20 + character 레벨 or 히트 다이스 + target’s 지혜 bonus [if any] + target’s modifiers on 내성 굴림 against 공포). If you beat your target’s check result, you may treat the target as friendly, but only for the 목적 of actions taken while it remains intimidated. (That is, the target retains its normal attitude, but will chat, advise, offer limited help, or advocate on your behalf while intimidated. See the 외교 skill, above, for additional details.) The effect lasts as long as the target remains in your presence, and for 1d6×10 minutes afterward. After this time, the target’s default attitude toward you shifts to unfriendly (or, if normally unfriendly, to hostile).

If you fail the check by 5 or more, the target provides you with incorrect or useless information, or otherwise frustrates your efforts.

사기저하 Opponent: You can also use 위협 to weaken an opponent’s resolve in 전투. To do so, make an 위협 check opposed by the target’s modified 레벨 check (see above). If you win, the target becomes shaken for 1 round. A shaken character takes a –2 penalty on 명중 굴림, 능력 판정, and 내성 굴림. You can 위협 only an opponent that you threaten in melee 전투 and that can see you.

Action: Varies. Changing another’s behavior requires 1 minute of interaction. Intimidating an opponent in 전투 I a standard action.

Try Again: Optional, but not recommended because retries usually do not work. Even if the initial check succeeds, the other character can be intimidated only so far, and a retry doesn’t help. If the initial check fails, the other character has probably become more firmly resolved to resist the intimidator, and a retry is futile.

Special: You gain a +4 bonus on your 위협 check for every size category that you are larger than your target. Conversely, you take a –4 penalty on your 위협 check for every size category that you are smaller than your target.

A character immune to 공포 can’t be intimidated, nor can nonintelligent creatures.

If you have the 설득력 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 위협 checks.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 허세, you get a +2 bonus on 위협 checks.

도약 (Str; 갑옷 판정 패널티)

JUMP (STR; ARMOR CHECK PENALTY)

Check: The DC and the distance you can 엄폐 vary according to the type of 도약 you are attempting (see below).

Your 도약 check is modified by your 속도. If your 속도 is 30 feet then no modifier based on 속도 applies to the check. If your 속도 is less than 30 feet, you take a –6 penalty for every 10 feet of 속도 less than 30 feet. If your 속도 is 상급 than 30 feet, you gain a +4 bonus for every 10 feet beyond 30 feet.

All 도약 DCs given here assume that you get a running start, which requires that you 이동 at least 20 feet in a straight line before attempting the 도약. If you do not get a running start, the DC for the 도약 is doubled.

Distance moved by jumping is counted against your normal maximum 이동 in a round.

If you have ranks in 도약 and you succeed on a 도약 check, you land on your feet (when appropriate). If you attempt a 도약 check untrained, you land prone unless you beat the DC by 5 or more.

Long 도약: A long 도약 is a horizontal 도약, made across a gap like a chasm or stream. At the midpoint of the 도약, you attain a vertical height equal to one-quarter of the horizontal distance. The DC for the 도약 is equal to the distance jumped (in feet).

If your check succeeds, you land on your feet at the far end. If you fail the check by less than 5, you don’t clear the distance, but you can make a DC 15 Reflex save to grab the far edge of the gap. You end your 이동 grasping the far edge. If that leaves you dangling over a chasm or gap, getting up requires a 이동 action and a DC 15 등반 check.

Long 도약 Distance도약 DC1
5 feet5
10 feet10
15 feet15
20 feet20
25 feet25
30 feet30
1 Requires a 20-foot running start. Without a running start, double the DC.

High 도약: A high 도약 is a vertical leap made to reach a ledge high above or to grasp something overhead. The DC is equal to 4 times the distance to be cleared.

If you jumped up to grab something, a successful check indicates that you reached the desired height. If you 소원 to pull yourself up, you can do so with a 이동 action and a DC 15 등반 check. If you fail the 도약 check, you do not reach the height, and you land on your feet in the same 감지 from which you jumped. As with a long 도약, the DC is doubled if you do not get a running start of at least 20 feet.

High 도약 Distance1도약 DC2
1 foot 4
2 feet 8
3 feet 12
4 feet 16
5 feet 20
6 feet 24
7 feet 28
8 feet 32
1 Not including vertical reach; see below.
2 Requires a 20-foot running start. Without a running start, double the DC.

Obviously, the difficulty of reaching a given height varies according to the size of the character or creature. The maximum vertical reach (height the creature can reach without jumping) for an average creature of a given size is shown on the table below. (As a Medium creature, a typical human can reach 8 feet without jumping.)

Quadrupedal creatures don’t have the same vertical reach as a bipedal creature; treat them as being one size category smaller.

Creature Size Vertical Reach
Colossal 128 ft.
Gargantuan 64 ft.
Huge 32 ft.
Large 16 ft.
Medium 8 ft.
Small 4 ft.
Tiny 2 ft.
Diminutive 1 ft.
Fine 1/2 ft.

Hop Up: You can 도약 up onto an object as tall as your waist, such as a table or small boulder, with a DC 10 도약 check. Doing so counts as 10 feet of 이동, so if your 속도 is 30 feet, you could 이동 20 feet, then hop up onto a counter. You do not need to get a running start to hop up, so the DC is not doubled if you do not get a running start.

Jumping Down: If you intentionally 도약 from a height, you take less 피해 than you would if you just fell. The DC to 도약 down from a height is 15. You do not have to get a running start to 도약 down, so the DC is not doubled if you do not get a running start.

If you succeed on the check, you take 낙하 피해 as if you had dropped 10 fewer feet than you actually did.

Action: None. A 도약 check is included in your 이동, so it is part of a 이동 action. If you 달리기 out of 이동 mid-도약, your next action (either on this turn or, if necessary, on your next turn) must be a 이동 action to complete the 도약.

Special: Effects that increase your 이동 also increase your jumping distance, since your check is modified by your 속도.

If you have the 달리기 feat, you get a +4 bonus on 도약 checks for any 도약 made after a running start.

A 하플링 has a +2 racial bonus on 도약 checks because 하플링 are 재빠름 and 운동선수.

If you have the 아크로바틱 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 도약 checks.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 재주넘기, you get a +2 bonus on 도약 checks.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 도약, you get a +2 bonus on 재주넘기 checks.

지식 (Int; 훈련 필수)

KNOWLEDGE (INT; TRAINED ONLY)

Like the 제작 and 전문직 스킬, 지식 actually encompasses a number of unrelated 스킬. 지식 represents a study of some body of lore, possibly an academic or even scientific 분야.

Below are listed typical fields of study.

• Arcana (ancient mysteries, magic traditions, arcane symbols, cryptic phrases, constructs, 드래곤, magical beasts)

• Architecture and engineering (buildings, aqueducts, bridges, fortifications)

• Dungeoneering (aberrations, caverns, 늪괴물, spelunking)

• Geography (lands, terrain, climate, people)

• History (royalty, wars, colonies, migrations, founding of cities)

• Local (legends, personalities, inhabitants, laws, customs, traditions, humanoids)

• Nature (animals, fey, 거인, monstrous humanoids, plants, seasons and cycles, 날씨, vermin)

• Nobility and royalty (lineages, heraldry, family trees, mottoes, personalities)

• Religion (gods and goddesses, mythic history, ecclesiastic tradition, holy symbols, undead)

• The 이세계 (the Inner 이세계, the Outer 이세계, 영적 세계, 에테리얼 세계, outsiders, 정령, magic related to the 이세계)

Check: Answering a question within your field of study has a DC of 10 (for really easy questions), 15 (for basic questions), or 20 to 30 (for really tough questions).

In many cases, you can use this skill to 식별 몬스터 and their special powers or vulnerabilities. In general, the DC of such a check equals 10 + the monster’s HD. A successful check allows you to remember a bit of useful information about that monster.

For every 5 points by which your check result exceeds the DC, you recall another piece of useful information.

Action: Usually none. In most cases, making a 지식 check doesn’t take an action—you simply know the answer or you don’t.

Try Again: No. The check represents what you know, and thinking about a topic a second time doesn’t let you know something that you never learned in the first place.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (arcana), you get a +2 bonus on 주문학 checks.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (architecture and engineering), you get a +2 bonus on 탐색 checks made to find secret 문 or hidden compartments.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (geography), you get a +2 bonus on 생존 checks made to keep from 길잃음 or to avoid natural hazards.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (history), you get a +2 bonus on bardic 지식 checks.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (local), you get a +2 bonus on 정보 수집 checks.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (nature), you get a +2 bonus on 생존 checks made in aboveground natural 환경 (aquatic, desert, forest, hill, marsh, mountains, or plains).

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (nobility and royalty), you get a +2 bonus on 외교 checks.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (religion), you get a +2 bonus on turning checks against undead.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (the 이세계), you get a +2 bonus on 생존 checks made while on other 이세계.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (dungeoneering), you get a +2 bonus on 생존 checks made while underground.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 생존, you get a +2 bonus on 지식 (nature) checks.

Untrained: An untrained 지식 check is simply an 지능 check. Without actual training, you know only common 지식 (DC 10 or lower).

듣기 (Wis)

LISTEN (WIS)

Check: Your 듣기 check is either made against a DC that reflects how quiet the noise is that you might hear, or it is opposed by your target’s 조용히 이동 check.

듣기 DC Sound
–10 A battle
0 People talking1
5 A person in medium 갑옷 walking at a 감속화 pace (10 ft./round) trying not to make any noise.
10 An unarmored person walking at a 감속화 pace (15 ft./round) trying not to make any noise
15 A 1st-레벨 도적 using 조용히 이동 to sneak past the listener
15 People whispering1
19 A 고양이 stalking
30 An 부엉이 gliding in for a kill
1 If you beat the DC by 10 or more, you can make out what’s being said, assuming that you understand the language.
듣기 DC ModifierCondition
+5Through a door
+15Through a stone wall
+1Per 10 feet of distance
+5Listener distracted

In the case of people trying to be quiet, the DCs given on the table could be replaced by 조용히 이동 checks, in which case the indicated DC would be their average check result.

Action: Varies. Every time you have a chance to hear something in a reactive manner (such as when someone makes a noise or you 이동 into a new area), you can make a 듣기 check without using an action. Trying to hear something you failed to hear previously is a 이동 action.

Try Again: Yes. You can try to hear something that you failed to hear previously with no penalty.

Special: When several characters are listening to the same thing, a single 1d20 roll can be used for all the individuals’ 듣기 checks.

A fascinated creature takes a –4 penalty on 듣기 checks made as reactions.

If you have the 경계 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 듣기 checks.

A 레인저 gains a bonus on 듣기 checks when using this skill against a favored enemy.

An 엘프, 노움, or 하플링 has a +2 racial bonus on 듣기 checks.

A 하프 엘프 has a +1 racial bonus on 듣기 checks..

A sleeping character may make 듣기 checks at a –10 penalty. A successful check 각성 the sleeper.

조용히 이동 (Dex; 갑옷 판정 패널티)

MOVE SILENTLY (DEX; ARMOR CHECK PENALTY)

Check: Your 조용히 이동 check is opposed by the 듣기 check of anyone who might hear you. You can 이동 up to one-half your normal 속도 at no penalty. When moving at a 속도 상급 than one-half but less than your full 속도, you take a –5 penalty. It’s practically impossible (–20 penalty) to 조용히 이동 while running or charging.

Noisy surfaces, such as bogs or undergrowth, are tough to 조용히 이동 across. When you try to sneak across such a surface, you take a penalty on your 조용히 이동 check as indicated below.

Surface Check Modifier
Noisy (scree, shallow or deep bog, undergrowth, dense rubble)–2
Very noisy (dense undergrowth, deep snow) –5

Action:None. A 조용히 이동 check is included in your 이동 or other activity, so it is part of another action.

Special: The master of a 고양이 familiar gains a +3 bonus on 조용히 이동 checks.

A 하플링 has a +2 racial bonus on 조용히 이동 checks.

If you have the 은신 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 조용히 이동 checks.

자물쇠 열기 (Dex; 훈련 필수)

OPEN LOCK (DEX; TRAINED ONLY)

Attempting an 자물쇠 열기 check without a set of thieves’ tools imposes a –2 circumstance penalty on the check, even if a simple tool is employed. If you use masterwork thieves’ tools, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on the check.

Check: The DC for opening a lock varies from 20 to 40, depending on the quality of the lock, as given on the table below.

Lock DC Lock DC
Very simple lock 20 Good lock 30
Average lock 25 Amazing lock 40

Action: Opening a lock is a full-round action.

Special: If you have the 기민한 손가락 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 자물쇠 열기 checks.

Untrained: You cannot pick locks untrained, but you might successfully force them open.

공연 (Cha)

PERFORM (CHA)

Like 제작, 지식, and 전문직, 공연 is actually a number of separate 스킬.

You could have several 공연 스킬, each with its own ranks, each purchased as a separate skill.

Each of the nine categories of the 공연 skill includes a variety of methods, instruments, or techniques, a small list of which is provided for each category below.

• Act (comedy, drama, mime)

• Comedy (buffoonery, limericks, joke-telling)

• Dance (ballet, waltz, jig)

• Keyboard instruments (harpsichord, piano, pipe organ)

• Oratory (에픽, ode, storytelling)

• Percussion instruments (bells, chimes, drums, gong)

• String instruments (fiddle, harp, lute, mandolin)

• Wind instruments (flute, pan pipes, recorder, shawm, trumpet)

• Sing (ballad, chant, melody)

Check: You can impress audiences with your talent and skill.

공연 DCPerformance
10Routine performance. Trying to earn money by playing in public is essentially begging. You can earn 1d10 cp/day.
15Enjoyable performance. In a prosperous city, you can earn 1d10 sp/day.
20Great performance. In a prosperous city, you can earn 3d10 sp/day. In time, you may be invited to join a professional troupe and may develop a regional reputation.
25Memorable performance. In a prosperous city, you can earn 1d6 gp/day. In time, you may come to the attention of noble patrons and develop a national reputation.
30Extraordinary performance. In a prosperous city, you can earn 3d6 gp/day. In time, you may draw attention from distant potential patrons, or even from extraplanar beings.

A masterwork musical instrument gives you a +2 circumstance bonus on 공연 checks that involve its use.

Action: Varies. Trying to earn money by playing in public requires anywhere from an evening’s work to a full day’s performance. The 음유시인’s special 공연-based 능력 are described in that class’s 묘사.

Try Again: Yes. Retries are allowed, but they don’t negate previous failures, and an audience that has been unimpressed in the past is likely to be prejudiced against future performances. (Increase the DC by 2 for each previous failure.)

Special: A 음유시인 must have at least 3 ranks in a 공연 skill to inspire courage in his allies, or to use his countersong or his fascinate ability. A 음유시인 needs 6 ranks in a 공연 skill to inspire competence, 9 ranks to use his 제안 ability, 12 ranks to inspire greatness, 15 ranks to use his song of 자유 ability, 18 ranks to inspire heroics, and 21 ranks to use his 광역 제안 ability. See Bardic Music in the 음유시인 class 묘사.

In addition to using the 공연 skill, you can entertain people with 날렵한 손재주, tumbling, tightrope walking, and 주문 (especially 환상).

전문직 (Wis; 훈련 필수)

PROFESSION (WIS; TRAINED ONLY)

Like 제작, 지식, and 공연, 전문직 is actually a number of separate 스킬. You could have several 전문직 스킬, each with its own ranks, each purchased as a separate skill. While a 제작 skill represents ability in creating or making an item, a 전문직 skill represents an aptitude in a vocation requiring a broader 범위 of less specific 지식.

Check: You can practice your trade and make a decent living, earning about half your 전문직 check result in gold pieces per week of dedicated work. You know how to use the tools of your trade, how to 공연 the 전문직’s daily tasks, how to supervise helpers, and how to handle common problems.

Action: Not applicable. A single check generally represents a week of work.

Try Again: Varies. An attempt to use a 전문직 skill to earn an income cannot be retried. You are stuck with whatever weekly wage your check result brought you. Another check may be made after a week to determine a new income for the next period of time. An attempt to accomplish some specific task can usually be retried.

Untrained: Untrained laborers and assistants (that is, characters without any ranks in 전문직) earn an average of 1 silver piece per day.

탑승 (Dex)

RIDE (DEX)

If you attempt to 탑승 a creature that is ill suited as a 탈것 소환, you take a –5 penalty on your 탑승 checks.

Check: Typical riding actions don’t require checks. You can saddle, 탈것 소환, 탑승, and dismount from a 탈것 소환 without a problem.

The following tasks do require checks.

Task 탑승 DC Task 탑승 DC
Guide with knees 5Leap 15
Stay in saddle 5Spur 탈것 소환 15
Fight with warhorse 10 Control 탈것 소환 in battle20
엄폐 15Fast 탈것 소환 or dismount201
Soft fall15
1 갑옷 check penalty applies.

Guide with Knees: You can react instantly to guide your 탈것 소환 with your knees so that you can use both hands in 전투. Make your 탑승 check at the start of your turn. If you fail, you can use only one hand this round because you need to use the other to control your 탈것 소환.

Stay in Saddle: You can react instantly to try to avoid 낙하 when your 탈것 소환 rears or 화살복제 unexpectedly or when you take 피해. This usage does not take an action.

Fight with Warhorse: If you direct your war-trained 탈것 소환 to 공격 in battle, you can still make your own 공격 or 공격 normally. This usage is a free action.

엄폐: You can react instantly to drop down and hang alongside your 탈것 소환, using it as 엄폐. You can’t 공격 or cast 주문 while using your 탈것 소환 as 엄폐. If you fail your 탑승 check, you don’t get the 엄폐 benefit. This usage does not take an action.

Soft Fall: You can react instantly to try to take no 피해 when you fall off a 탈것 소환—when it is killed or when it falls, for example. If you fail your 탑승 check, you take 1d6 points of 낙하 피해. This usage does not take an action.

Leap: You can get your 탈것 소환 to leap obstacles as part of its 이동. Use your 탑승 modifier or the 탈것 소환’s 도약 modifier, whichever is lower, to see how far the creature can 도약. If you fail your 탑승 check, you fall off the 탈것 소환 when it leaps and take the appropriate 낙하 피해 (at least 1d6 points). This usage does not take an action, but is part of the 탈것 소환’s 이동.

Spur 탈것 소환: You can spur your 탈것 소환 to 상급 속도 with a 이동 action. A successful 탑승 check increases the 탈것 소환’s 속도 by 10 feet for 1 round but deals 1 point of 피해 to the creature. You can use this ability every round, but each consecutive round of additional 속도 deals twice as much 피해 to the 탈것 소환 as the previous round (2 points, 4 points, 8 points, and so on).

Control 탈것 소환 in Battle: As a 이동 action, you can attempt to control a 빛 말, 조랑말, heavy 말, or other 탈것 소환 not trained for 전투 riding while in battle. If you fail the 탑승 check, you can do nothing else in that round. You do not need to roll for warhorses or warponies.

Fast 탈것 소환 or Dismount: You can attempt to 탈것 소환 or dismount from a 탈것 소환 of up to one size category larger than yourself as a free action, provided that you still have a 이동 action available that round. If you fail the 탑승 check, mounting or dismounting is a 이동 action. You can’t use fast 탈것 소환 or dismount on a 탈것 소환 more than one size category larger than yourself.

Action: Varies. Mounting or dismounting normally is a 이동 action. Other checks are a 이동 action, a free action, or no action at all, as noted above.

Special: If you are riding bareback, you take a –5 penalty on 탑승 checks.

If your 탈것 소환 has a military saddle you get a +2 circumstance bonus on 탑승 checks related to staying in the saddle.

The 탑승 skill is a prerequisite for the 특기 기마 궁술, 기마 전투, 마상 공격, 맹렬한 돌격,

짓밟기.

If you have the 동물 친화력 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 탑승 checks.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 동물 조련, you get a +2 bonus on 탑승 checks.

2 A successful 탐색 check can find a footprint or similar sign of a creature’s passage, but it won’t let you find or follow a trail. See the 추적 feat for the appropriate DC.

Special: An 엘프 has a +2 racial bonus on 탐색 checks, and a 하프 엘프 has a +1 racial bonus. An 엘프 (but not a 하프 엘프) who simply passes within 5 feet of a secret or concealed door can make a 탐색 check to find that door.

If you have the 수사관 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 탐색 checks.

The 주문 폭발성 룬, 화염 함정, 수호의 문양, symbol, and 순간이동 마법진 create 마법 함정 that a 도적 can find by making a successful 탐색 check and then can attempt to 무장해제 by using 장치 무력화. Identifying the location of a 올무 spell has a DC of 23. 가시 성장 and 가시 암석 create 마법 함정 that can be found using 탐색, but against which 장치 무력화 checks do not succeed. See the individual 주문 설명 for details.

Active 회피술 주문 within 10 feet of each other for 24 hours or more create barely visible energy fluctuations. These fluctuations give you a +4 bonus on 탐색 checks to locate such 회피술 주문.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 탐색, you get a +2 bonus on 생존 checks to find or follow 추적.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (architecture and engineering), you get a +2 bonus on 탐색 checks to find secret 문 or hidden compartments.

Restriction: While anyone can use 탐색 to find a trap whose DC is 20 or lower, only a 도적 can use 탐색 to locate 함정 with higher DCs. (Exception: The spell 함정 찾기 temporarily enables a 사제 to use the 탐색 skill as if he were a 도적.)

A 드워프, even one who is not a 도적, can use the 탐색 skill to find a difficult trap (one with a DC higher than 20) if the trap is built into or out of stone. He gains a +2 racial bonus on the 탐색 check from his stonecunning ability.

의도 파악 (Wis)

SENSE MOTIVE (WIS)

Check: A successful check lets you avoid being bluffed (see the 허세 skill). You can also use this skill to determine when “something is up” (that is, something odd is going on) or to assess someone’s trustworthiness.

Task 의도 파악 DC
Hunch 20
Sense 마력부여술 25 or 15
Discern secret 통보 Varies

Hunch: This use of the skill involves making a gut assessment of the social situation. You can get the feeling from another’s behavior that something is wrong, such as when you’re talking to an impostor. Alternatively, you can get the feeling that someone is trustworthy.

Sense 마력부여술: You can tell that someone’s behavior is being influenced by an 마력부여술 effect (by definition, a mind-affecting effect),even if that person isn’t aware of it. The usual DC is 25, but if the target is dominated (see 인간형 지배), the DC is only 15 because of the limited 범위 of the target’s activities.

Discern Secret 통보: You may use 의도 파악 to detect that a hidden 통보 is being transmitted via the 허세 skill. In this case, your 의도 파악 check is opposed by the 허세 check of the character transmitting the 통보. For each piece of information relating to the 통보 that you are missing, you take a –2 penalty on your 의도 파악 check. If you succeed by 4 or less, you know that something hidden is being communicated, but you can’t learn anything specific about its content. If you beat the DC by 5 or more, you intercept and understand the 통보. If you fail by 4 or less, you don’t detect any hidden communication. If you fail by 5 or more, you infer some false information.

Action: Trying to gain information with 의도 파악 generally takes at least 1 minute, and you could spend a whole evening trying to get a sense of the people around you.

Try Again: No, though you may make a 의도 파악 check for each 허세 check made against you.

Special: A 레인저 gains a bonus on 의도 파악 checks when using this skill against a favored enemy.

If you have the 협상가 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 의도 파악 checks.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 의도 파악, you get a +2 bonus on 외교 checks.

날렵한 손재주 (Dex; 훈련 필수; 갑옷 판정 패널티)

SLEIGHT OF HAND (DEX; TRAINED ONLY; ARMOR CHECK PENALTY)

Check: A DC 10 날렵한 손재주 check lets you palm a coin-sized, unattended object. Performing a minor feat of legerdemain, such as making a coin disappear, also has a DC of 10 unless an observer is determined to note where the item went.

When you use this skill under close observation, your skill check is opposed by the observer’s 감지 check. The observer’s success doesn’t prevent you from performing the action, just from doing it unnoticed.

You can 숨기 a small object (including a 빛 weapon or an easily concealed ranged weapon, such as a dart, sling, or hand crossbow) on your body. Your 날렵한 손재주 check is opposed by the 감지 check of anyone observing you or the 탐색 check of anyone frisking you. In the latter case, the searcher gains a +4 bonus on the 탐색 check, since it’s generally easier to find such an object than to 숨기 it. A dagger is easier to 숨기 than most 빛 무기, and grants you a +2 bonus on your 날렵한 손재주 check to conceal it. An extraordinarily small object, such as a coin, shuriken, or ring, grants you a +4 bonus on your 날렵한 손재주 check to conceal it, and heavy or baggy 의류 (such as a cloak) grants you a +2 bonus on the check.

Drawing a hidden weapon is a standard action and doesn’t provoke an 공격 of opportunity.

If you try to take something from another creature, you must make a DC 20 날렵한 손재주 check to obtain it. The opponent makes a 감지 check to detect the attempt, opposed by the same 날렵한 손재주 check result you achieved when you tried to grab the item. An opponent who succeeds on this check notices the attempt, regardless of whether you got the item.

You can also use 날렵한 손재주 to entertain an audience as though you were using the 공연 skill. In such a case, your “act” encompasses elements of legerdemain, juggling, and the like.

날렵한 손재주 DC Task
10Palm a coin-sized object, make a coin disappear
20Lift a small object from a person

Action: Any 날렵한 손재주 check normally is a standard action. However, you may 공연 a 날렵한 손재주 check as a free action by taking a –20 penalty on the check.

Try Again: Yes, but after an initial failure, a second 날렵한 손재주 attempt against the same target (or while you are being watched by the same observer who noticed your previous attempt) increases the DC for the task by 10.

Special: If you have the 능숙한 손놀림 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 날렵한 손재주 checks.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 허세, you get a +2 bonus on 날렵한 손재주 checks.

Untrained: An untrained 날렵한 손재주 check is simply a 민첩 check. Without actual training, you can’t succeed on any 날렵한 손재주 check with a DC higher than 10, except for hiding an object on your body.

The 언어 말하기 skill doesn’t work like other 스킬. Languages work as follows.

• You start at 1 레벨 knowing one or two languages (based on your race), plus an additional number of languages equal to your starting 지능 bonus.

• You can purchase 언어 말하기 just like any other skill, but instead of buying a rank in it, you choose a new language that you can 말하기.

• You don’t make 언어 말하기 checks. You either know a language or you don’t.

• A literate character (anyone but a 바바리안 who has not spent skill points to become literate) can read and write any language she 말하기. Each language has an alphabet, though sometimes several spoken languages share a single alphabet.

If you have the 마법 재능 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 주문학 checks.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (arcana), you get a +2 bonus on 주문학 checks.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 마법 장치 사용, you get a +2 bonus on 주문학 checks to decipher 주문 on 두루마리.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 주문학, you get a +2 bonus on 마법 장치 사용 checks related to 두루마리.

Additionally, certain 주문 allow you to gain information about magic, provided that you make a successful 주문학 check as detailed in the spell 묘사.

감지 (Wis)

SPOT (WIS)

Check: The 감지 skill is used primarily to detect characters or creatures who are hiding. Typically, your 감지 check is opposed by the 숨기 check of the creature trying not to be seen. Sometimes a creature isn’t intentionally hiding but is still difficult to see, so a successful 감지 check is necessary to notice it.

A 감지 check result higher than 20 generally lets you become aware of an invisible creature near you, though you can’t actually see it.

감지 is also used to detect someone in 변장 (see the 변장 skill), and to read lips when you can’t hear or understand what someone is saying.

감지 checks may be called for to determine the distance at which an encounter begins. A penalty applies on such checks, depending on the distance between the two individuals or groups, and an additional penalty may apply if the character making the 감지 check is distracted (not concentrating on being observant).

Condition Penalty
Per 10 feet of distance –1
Spotter distracted –5

Read Lips: To understand what someone is saying by reading lips, you must be within 30 feet of the speaker, be able to see him or her 말하기, and understand the speaker’s language. (This use of the skill is language-dependent.) The base DC is 15, but it increases for complex speech or an inarticulate speaker. You must maintain a line of sight to the lips being read.

If your 감지 check succeeds, you can understand the general content of a minute’s worth of speaking, but you usually still miss certain details. If the check fails by 4 or less, you can’t read the speaker’s lips. If the check fails by 5 or more, you draw some incorrect conclusion about the speech. The check is rolled secretly in this case, so that you don’t know whether you succeeded or missed by 5.

Action: Varies. Every time you have a chance to 감지 something in a reactive manner you can make a 감지 check without using an action. Trying to 감지 something you failed to see previously is a 이동 action. To read lips, you must concentrate for a full minute before making a 감지 check, and you can’t 공연 any other action (other than moving at up to half 속도) during this minute.

Try Again: Yes. You can try to 감지 something that you failed to see previously at no penalty. You can attempt to read lips once per minute.

Special: A fascinated creature takes a –4 penalty on 감지 checks made as reactions.

If you have the 경계 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 감지 checks.

A 레인저 gains a bonus on 감지 checks when using this skill against a favored enemy.

An 엘프 has a +2 racial bonus on 감지 checks.

A 하프 엘프 has a +1 racial bonus on 감지 checks.

The master of a 매 familiar gains a +3 bonus on 감지 checks in 햇살 or other lighted areas.

The master of an 부엉이 familiar gains a +3 bonus on 감지 checks in shadowy or other darkened areas.

Check: You can keep yourself and others safe and fed in the wild. The table below gives the DCs for various tasks that require 생존 checks.

생존 DC Task
10 Get along in the wild. 이동 up to one-half your overland 속도 while hunting and foraging (no food or water supplies needed). You can provide food and water for one other person for every 2 points by which your check result exceeds 10.
15Gain a +2 bonus on all Fortitude 내성 굴림 against severe 날씨 while moving up to one-half your overland 속도, or gain a +4 bonus if you remain stationary. You may grant the same bonus to one other character for every 1 point by which your 생존 check result exceeds 15.
15 Keep from 길잃음 or avoid natural hazards, such as quicksand.
15 Predict the 날씨 up to 24 hours in advance. For every 5 points by which your 생존 check result exceeds 15, you can predict the 날씨 for one additional day in advance.
Varies Follow 추적 (see the 추적 feat).

Action: Varies. A single 생존 check may represent activity over the course of hours or a full day. A 생존 check made to find 추적 is at least a full-round action, and it may take even longer.

Try Again: Varies. For getting along in the wild or for gaining the Fortitude save bonus noted in the table above, you make a 생존 check once every 24 hours. The result of that check applies until the next check is made. To avoid 길잃음 or avoid natural hazards, you make a 생존 check whenever the situation calls for one. Retries to avoid 길잃음 in a specific situation or to avoid a specific natural hazard are not allowed. For finding 추적, you can retry a failed check after 1 hour (outdoors) or 10 minutes(indoors) of searching.

Restriction: While anyone can use 생존 to find 추적 (regardless of the DC), or to follow 추적 when the DC for the task is 10 or lower, only a 레인저 (or a character with the 추적 feat) can use 생존 to follow 추적 when the task has a higher DC.

Special: If you have 5 or more ranks in 생존, you can automatically determine where true north lies in relation to yourself.

A 레인저 gains a bonus on 생존 checks when using this skill to find or follow the 추적 of a favored enemy.

If you have the 자급자족 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 생존 checks.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 생존, you get a +2 bonus on 지식 (nature) checks.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (dungeoneering), you get a +2 bonus on 생존 checks made while underground.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (nature), you get a +2 bonus on 생존 checks in aboveground natural 환경 (aquatic, desert, forest, hill, marsh, mountains, and plains).

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (geography), you get a +2 bonus on 생존 checks made to keep from 길잃음 or to avoid natural hazards.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 지식 (the 이세계), you get a +2 bonus on 생존 checks made while on other 이세계.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 탐색, you get a +2 bonus on 생존 checks to find or follow 추적.

수영 (Str; 갑옷 판정 패널티)

SWIM (STR; ARMOR CHECK PENALTY)

Check: Make a 수영 check once per round while you are in the water. Success means you may 수영 at up to one-half your 속도 (as a full-round action) or at one-quarter your 속도 (as a 이동 action). If you fail by 4 or less, you make no progress through the water. If you fail by 5 or more, you go underwater.

If you are underwater, either because you failed a 수영 check or because you are swimming underwater intentionally, you must hold your breath. You can hold your breath for a number of rounds equal to your 건강 score, but only if you do nothing other than take 이동 행동 or 자유 행동. If you take a standard action or a full-round action (such as making an 공격), the remainder of the 지속시간 for which you can hold your breath is reduced by 1 round. (Effectively, a character in 전투 can hold his or her breath only half as long as normal.) After that period of time, you must make a DC 10 건강 check every round to continue holding your breath. Each round, the DC for that check increases by 1. If you fail the 건강 check, you begin to drown.

The DC for the 수영 check depends on the water, as given on the table below.

Water수영 DC
Calm water 10
Rough water 15
Stormy water 201
1 You can’t take 10 on a 수영 check in stormy water, even if you aren’t otherwise being threatened or distracted.

Each hour that you 수영, you must make a DC 20 수영 check or take 1d6 points of 비치명적인 피해 from fatigue.

Action: A successful 수영 check allows you to 수영 one-quarter of your 속도 as a 이동 action or one-half your 속도 as a full-round action.

Special: 수영 checks are subject to double the normal 갑옷 check penalty and encumbrance penalty.

If you have the 운동선수 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 수영 checks.

If you have the 지구력 feat, you get a +4 bonus on 수영 checks made to avoid taking 비치명적인 피해 from fatigue.

A creature with a 수영 속도 can 이동 through water at its indicated 속도 without making 수영 checks. It gains a +8 racial bonus on any 수영 check to 공연 a special action or avoid a hazard. The creature always can choose to take 10 on a 수영 check, even if distracted or endangered when swimming. Such a creature can use the 달리기 action while swimming, provided that it 수영 in a straight line.

재주넘기 (Dex; 훈련 필수; 갑옷 판정 패널티)

TUMBLE (DEX; TRAINED ONLY; ARMOR CHECK PENALTY)

You can’t use this skill if your 속도 has been reduced by 갑옷, excess 장비, or loot.

Check: You can land softly when you fall or 재주넘기 past opponents. You can also 재주넘기 to entertain an audience (as though using the 공연 skill). The DCs for various tasks involving the 재주넘기 skill are given on the table below.

재주넘기 DC Task
15 Treat a fall as if it were 10 feet shorter than it really is when determining 피해.
15
재주넘기 at one-half 속도 as part of normal 이동, provoking no 기회 공격 while doing so. Failure means you provoke 기회 공격 normally. Check separately for each opponent you 이동 past, in the order in which you pass them (player’s choice of order in case of a tie).
Each additional enemy after the first adds +2 to the 재주넘기 DC.
25
재주넘기 at one-half 속도 through an area occupied by an enemy (over, under, or around the opponent) as part of normal 이동, provoking no 기회 공격 while doing so. Failure means you stop before entering the enemy-occupied area and provoke an 공격 of opportunity from that enemy.
Check separately for each opponent. Each additional enemy after the first adds +2 to the 재주넘기 DC.

Obstructed or otherwise treacherous surfaces, such as natural cavern 바닥 or undergrowth, are tough to 재주넘기 through. The DC for any 재주넘기 check made to 재주넘기 into such a square is modified as indicated below.

Surface Is . . . DC Modifier
Lightly obstructed (scree, 빛 rubble, shallow bog1, undergrowth) +2

Accelerated Tumbling: You try to 재주넘기 past or through enemies more quickly than normal. By accepting a –10 penalty on your 재주넘기 checks, you can 이동 at your full 속도 instead of one-half your 속도.

Action: Not applicable. Tumbling is part of 이동, so a 재주넘기 check is part of a 이동 action.

Try Again: Usually no. An audience, once it has judged a tumbler as an uninteresting performer, is not receptive to repeat performances.

You can try to reduce 피해 from a fall as an instant reaction only once per fall.

Special: If you have 5 or more ranks in 재주넘기, you gain a +3 회피 bonus to AC when fighting defensively instead of the usual +2 회피 bonus to AC.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 재주넘기, you gain a +6 회피 bonus to AC when executing the 총력 방어 standard action instead of the usual +4 회피 bonus to AC.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 재주넘기, you get a +2 bonus on 균형 and 도약 checks.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 도약, you get a +2 bonus on 재주넘기 checks.

마법 장치 사용 (Cha; 훈련 필수)

USE MAGIC DEVICE (CHA; TRAINED ONLY)

Use this skill to activate magic

Check: You can use this skill to read a spell or to activate a magic item. 마법 장치 사용 lets you use a magic item as if you had the spell ability or 직업 특성 of another class, as if you were a different race, or as if you were of a different 성향.

You make a 마법 장치 사용 check each time you activate a device such as a wand. If you are using the check to emulate an 성향 or some other quality in an ongoing manner, you need to make the relevant 마법 장치 사용 check once per hour.

You must consciously choose which requirement to emulate. That is, you must know what you are trying to emulate when you make a 마법 장치 사용 check for that 목적. The DCs for various tasks involving 마법 장치 사용 checks are summarized on the table below.

Task 마법 장치 사용 DC
Activate blindly 25
Decipher a written spell 25 + spell 레벨
Use a scroll 20 + 시전자 레벨
Use a wand 20
Emulate a class feature 20
Emulate an ability score See text
Emulate a race 25
Emulate an 성향 30

Activate Blindly: Some 마법 아이템 are activated by special words, thoughts, or actions. You can activate such an item as if you were using the activation word, thought, or action, even when you’re not and even if you don’t know it. You do have to 공연 some equivalent activity in order to make the check. That is, you must 말하기, wave the item around, or otherwise attempt to get it to activate. You get a special +2 bonus on your 마법 장치 사용 check if you’ve activated the item in question at least once before. If you fail by 9 or less, you can’t activate the device. If you fail by 10 or more, you suffer a mishap. A mishap means that magical energy gets released but it doesn’t do what you wanted it to do. The default mishaps are that the item affects the wrong target or that uncontrolled magical energy is released, dealing 2d6 points of 피해 to you. This mishap is in addition to the chance for a mishap that you normally 달리기 when you 주문 시전 from a scroll that you could not otherwise cast yourself.

Decipher a Written Spell: This usage works just like deciphering a written spell with the 주문학 skill, except that the DC is 5 points higher. Deciphering a written spell requires 1 minute of 집중.

Emulate an Ability Score: To 주문 시전 from a scroll, you need a high score in the appropriate ability (지능 for 마법사 주문, 지혜 for 신성 주문, or 매력 for 소서러 or 음유시인 주문). Your effective ability score (appropriate to the class you’re emulating when you try to cast the spell from the scroll) is your 마법 장치 사용 check result minus 15. If you already have a high enough score in the appropriate ability, you don’t need to make this check.

Emulate an 성향: Some 마법 아이템 have positive or negative effects based on the user’s 성향. 마법 장치 사용 lets you use these items as if you were of an 성향 of your choice. You can emulate only one 성향 at a time.

Emulate a Class Feature: Sometimes you need to use a class feature to activate a magic item. In this case, your effective 레벨 in the emulated class equals your 마법 장치 사용 check result minus 20.  This skill does not let you actually use the class feature of another class. It just lets you activate items as if you had that class feature. If the class whose feature you are emulating has an 성향 requirement, you must meet it, either honestly or by emulating an appropriate 성향 with a separate 마법 장치 사용 check (see above).

Emulate a Race: Some 마법 아이템 work only for members of certain 종족, or work better for members of those 종족. You can use such an item as if you were a race of your choice. You can emulate only one race at a time.

Use a Scroll: If you are casting a spell from a scroll, you have to decipher it first. Normally, to 주문 시전 from a scroll, you must have the scroll’s spell on your class spell list. 마법 장치 사용 allows you to use a scroll as if you had a particular spell on your class spell list. The DC is equal to 20 + the 시전자 레벨 of the spell you are trying to cast from the scroll. In addition, casting a spell from a scroll requires a minimum score (10 + spell 레벨) in the appropriate ability. If you don’t have a sufficient score in that ability, you must emulate the ability score with a separate 마법 장치 사용 check (see above).

This use of the skill also applies to other spell completion 마법 아이템.

Use a Wand: Normally, to use a wand, you must have the wand’s spell on your class spell list. This use of the skill allows you to use a wand as if you had a particular spell on your class spell list. This use of the skill also applies to other spell 신관 마법 아이템, such as 마법지팡이.

Action: None. The 마법 장치 사용 check is made as part of the action (if any) required to activate the magic item.

Try Again: Yes, but if you ever roll a natural 1 while attempting to activate an item and you fail, then you can’t try to activate that item again for 24 hours.

Special: You cannot take 10 with this skill.

You can’t 보조하기 on 마법 장치 사용 checks. Only the user of the item may attempt such a check.

If you have the 마법 재능 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 마법 장치 사용 checks.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 주문학, you get a +2 bonus on 마법 장치 사용 checks related to 두루마리.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 문자 해독, you get a +2 bonus on 마법 장치 사용 checks related to 두루마리.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 마법 장치 사용, you get a +2 bonus to 주문학 checks made to decipher 주문 on 두루마리.

밧줄 사용 (Dex)

USE ROPE (DEX)

Check: Most tasks with a rope are relatively simple. The DCs for various tasks utilizing this skill are summarized on the table below.

밧줄 사용 DCTask
10Tie a firm knot
101Secure a grappling hook
15Tie a special knot, such as one that slips, slides slowly, or loosens with a tug

VariesBind a character
1 Add 2 to the DC for every 10 feet the hook is thrown; see below.

Secure a Grappling Hook: Securing a grappling hook requires a 밧줄 사용 check (DC 10, +2 for every 10 feet of distance the grappling hook is thrown, to a maximum DC of 20 at 50 feet). Failure by 4 or less indicates that the hook fails to catch and falls, allowing you to try again. Failure by 5 or more indicates that the grappling hook initially holds, but comes loose after 1d4 rounds of supporting weight. This check is made secretly, so that you don’t know whether the rope will hold your weight.

Bind a Character: When you bind another character with a rope, any 탈출 전문가 check that the bound character makes is opposed by your 밧줄 사용 check.

You get a +10 bonus on this check because it is easier to bind someone than to escape from bonds. You don’t even make your 밧줄 사용 check until someone tries to escape.

Action: Varies. Throwing a grappling hook is a standard action that provokes an 공격 of opportunity. Tying a knot, tying a special knot, or tying a rope around yourself one-handed is a full-round action that provokes an 공격 of opportunity. Splicing two ropes together takes 5 minutes. 결속 a character takes 1 minute.

Special: A silk rope gives you a +2 circumstance bonus on 밧줄 사용 checks. If you cast an 살아 움직이는 밧줄 spell on a rope, you get a +2 circumstance bonus on any 밧줄 사용 checks you make when using that rope.

These bonuses stack.

If you have the 능숙한 손놀림 feat, you get a +2 bonus on 밧줄 사용 checks.

Synergy: If you have 5 or more ranks in 밧줄 사용, you get a +2 bonus on 등반 checks made to 등반 a rope, a knotted rope, or a rope-and-wall combination.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 밧줄 사용, you get a +2 bonus on 탈출 전문가 checks when escaping from rope bonds.

If you have 5 or more ranks in 탈출 전문가, you get a +2 bonus on checks made to bind someone.
